## Installation

You can install the development version of toyhi from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("maurolepore/toyhi")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(toyhi)

hi()

hi("me")
```
